languages.text: Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their turns and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, blinded, staggered, or fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого своего хода до конца боя цель восстанавливает {uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и избавляется от эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, ослепления, ошеломления или утомления. Если на цель наложено несколько эффектов, то снимается эффект, выбранный случайным образом.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the target recovers +<u>(Psyker's psy rating + WP bonus / 2)</u> wounds at the beginning of each their turn and removes one toxin, stunned, immobilised, bleeding, blinded, staggered, and fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the one to be removed is selected randomly.

Until the end of combat, the target recovers +<u>(psyker's psy rating + WP bonus / 2)</u> wounds at the beginning of each of their turns and removes one toxin, stunned, immobilised, bleeding, blinded, staggered, or fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.

Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their turns and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, blinded, staggered, or fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.

Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.

Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their turns and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, blinded, staggered, or fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.

languages.text: 目标在每个回合开始时，都会恢复{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，并移除{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、致盲、恐慌或疲劳效果，此效果持续至战斗结束。如果目标受到多个负面效果影响，则随机移除一个效果。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their turns and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, blinded, staggered, or fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.

traits.locale_text: 目标在每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都会恢复<u>（灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，并移除{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，此效果持续至战斗结束。如果目标受到多个负面效果影响，则随机移除一个效果。

目标在每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都会恢复{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，并移除{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，此效果持续至战斗结束。如果目标受到多个负面效果影响，则随机移除一个效果。

目标在每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都会恢复{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，并移除{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}效果，此效果持续至战斗结束。如果目标受到多个负面效果影响，则随机移除一个效果。

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, el objetivo recupera +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al comienzo de cada uno de sus turnos y elimina un efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdimiento{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilización{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}sangrado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ceguera{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrio{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatiga{/g}. Si el objetivo tiene distintos efectos, se elimina uno al azar.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their turns and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, blinded, staggered, or fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, el objetivo recupera +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} del psíquico / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al comienzo de cada uno de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} y elimina un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdimiento{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilización{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}sangrado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ceguera{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrio{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatiga{/g}. Si el objetivo tiene distintos efectos, se elimina uno al azar.

Hasta el final del combate, el objetivo recupera +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al comienzo de cada uno de sus {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} y elimina un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdimiento{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilización{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}sangrado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ceguera{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrio{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatiga{/g}. Si el objetivo tiene distintos efectos, se elimina uno al azar.

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、ターゲットは各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42}の {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}回復効果を得る。また、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}効果のいずれかひとつから回復する。ターゲットに複数の効果が発生している場合、どの効果から回復するかはランダムで選ばれる。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their turns and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, blinded, staggered, or fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了まで、ターゲットは各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に +<u>(異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2)</u>の {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}回復効果を得る。また、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}のいずれかひとつから回復する。ターゲットに複数の効果が発生している場合、どの効果から回復するかはランダムで選ばれる。

戦闘終了まで、ターゲットは各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42}の {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}回復効果を得る。また、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}のいずれかひとつから回復する。ターゲットに複数の効果が発生している場合、どの効果から回復するかはランダムで選ばれる。

languages.text: В начале каждого своего хода до конца боя цель восстанавливает {uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и избавляется от эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, ослепления, ошеломления или утомления. Если на цель наложено несколько эффектов, то снимается эффект, выбранный случайным образом.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their turns and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, blinded, staggered, or fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.

traits.locale_text: В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} до конца боя цель восстанавливает <u>({g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и избавляется от {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекта{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломления{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g}. Если на цель наложено несколько эффектов, то снимается эффект, выбранный случайным образом.

В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} до конца боя цель восстанавливает <u>({g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и избавляется от {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекта{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломления{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g}. Если на цель наложено несколько эффектов, то снимается эффект, выбранный случайным образом.

В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} до конца боя цель восстанавливает {uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и избавляется от {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффекта{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломления{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомления{/g}. Если на цель наложено несколько эффектов, то снимается эффект, выбранный случайным образом.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erholt sich das Ziel um +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu Beginn jedes seiner Züge. Außerdem wird ein {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-, Geblendet-, Entsetzt- oder Erschöpft-Effekt entfernt. Wenn mehrere Effekte auf das Ziel wirken, wird der entfernte Effekt nach dem Zufallsprinzip ausgewählt.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their turns and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, blinded, staggered, or fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erholt sich das Ziel um +<u>(Psioniker-{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} /2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, und zwar jeweils bei {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Rundenbeginn{/g}. Außerdem wird ein {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Entsetzt{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} entfernt. Wenn mehrere Effekte auf das Ziel wirken, wird der entfernte Effekt nach dem Zufallsprinzip ausgewählt.

Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erholt sich das Ziel um +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, und zwar jeweils bei {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Rundenbeginn{/g}. Außerdem wird ein {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Entsetzt{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} entfernt. Wenn mehrere Effekte auf das Ziel wirken, wird der entfernte Effekt nach dem Zufallsprinzip ausgewählt.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, la cible récupère +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} au début de chacun de ses tours, et elle est libérée d'un effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, Aveuglement, Sidération ou Fatigue. Si la cible subit plusieurs effets, celui dont elle est libérée est sélectionné au hasard.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their turns and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, blinded, staggered, or fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, la cible récupère +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} du psyker + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} au début de chacun de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}, et elle est libérée d'un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}. Si la cible subit plusieurs effets, celui dont elle est libérée est sélectionné au hasard.

Jusqu'à la fin du combat, la cible récupère +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} au début de chacun de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}, et elle est libérée d'un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}. Si la cible subit plusieurs effets, celui dont elle est libérée est sélectionné au hasard.

languages.text: Çatışma sonuna dek hedefin her turunun başında +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı tazelenir ve üzerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, körleşme, afallama veya yorgunluk etkilerinden biri ortadan kalkar. Hedefte birden çok etki varsa kaldırılacak etki rastgele seçilir.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the target recovers +{uip|Heal|1161a6715442449da47157aa60274a42} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of each of their turns and removes one {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, blinded, staggered, or fatigued effect. If the target has several effects, the removed effect is selected randomly.
